ItemTooltips.ring_of_health: If you are getting harassed a lot in lane pick up a Ring of Health. This will later build into your Battle Fury.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Only get this item if you can get it before 8 minutes.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Only needed if you are being harrassed a lot in lane. If not, feel free to skip this item.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If they have a carry that builds evasion items, or if playing against Phantom Assassin, Brewmaster, etc.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: A good follow up to Mask of Madness, more attacks means more chances to critical strike.
ItemTooltips.bfury: Pick this up if you feel the need to farm or if you picked up a Ring of Health early on.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: A cost effective item to increase your attack speed. The faster you attack the more likely you will bash.
